topic.title: What's New
topic.shortdesc: This release includes the following new security-features: Role-Based Access Control and Authentication Domains.

body.p: This release of Couchbase Server provides the following new features:

dlentry.dd: Access privileges are assigned to fixed roles; which are in turn assigned to administrators and applications. See Authorization.

dd.p: Couchbase Server assigns users to different authentication domains, based on whether their definition is local (that is, on Couchbase Server itself) or external (that is, by means of LDAP or PAM). See Authentication Domains.
